problem_definition.command_line: cd meshes gmsh -1 line_10.geo -o line_10.msh gmsh -1 line_80.geo -o line_80.msh gmsh -2 rectangle_reg_10.geo -o rectangle_reg_10.msh gmsh -2 rectangle_reg_40.geo -o rectangle_reg_40.msh gmsh -3 cuboid_reg_10.geo -o cuboid_reg_10.msh gmsh -3 cuboid_reg_20.geo -o cuboid_reg_20.msh cd ../simulations ../../../bin/darcy_impes p1satdiag_relpermupwind_1d_10.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes p1satdiag_relpermupwind_1d_80.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes p1satdiag_relpermupwind_2d_10.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes p1satdiag_relpermupwind_2d_40.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes p1satdiag_relpermupwind_3d_10.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes p1satdiag_relpermupwind_3d_20.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes p1satdiag_modrelpermupwind_1d_10.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes p1satdiag_modrelpermupwind_1d_80.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes p1satdiag_modrelpermupwind_2d_10.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes p1satdiag_modrelpermupwind_2d_40.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes p1satdiag_modrelpermupwind_3d_10.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes p1satdiag_modrelpermupwind_3d_20.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes withgrav_updip_relpermupwind_1d_10.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes withgrav_updip_relpermupwind_1d_80.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes withgrav_updip_relpermupwind_2d_10.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes withgrav_updip_relpermupwind_2d_40.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes withgrav_updip_relpermupwind_3d_10.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes withgrav_updip_relpermupwind_3d_20.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes withgrav_updip_modrelpermupwind_1d_10.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes withgrav_updip_modrelpermupwind_1d_80.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes withgrav_updip_modrelpermupwind_2d_10.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes withgrav_updip_modrelpermupwind_2d_40.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes withgrav_updip_modrelpermupwind_3d_10.diml ../../../bin/darcy_impes withgrav_updip_modrelpermupwind_3d_20.diml cd ..

import numpy current_abscissa = float(abscissa_p1satdiag_relpermupwind_1d_80_saturation2) current_error = numpy.abs(error_p1satdiag_relpermupwind_1d_80_saturation2) previous_abscissa = float(abscissa_p1satdiag_relpermupwind_1d_10_saturation2) previous_error = numpy.abs(error_p1satdiag_relpermupwind_1d_10_saturation2) rate_p1satdiag_relpermupwind_1d_saturation2_10_80 = \ numpy.log(current_error/previous_error) / \ numpy.log(current_abscissa/previous_abscissa)
